name: MitziTalk
_source: s;Simon;How does it feel to be home?
s;Mitzi;The same as always.{w} Little changes here, Simon.
s;Simon;Truly? Even in the outer city?
s;Mitzi;Little of import changes.{w} The plebians may do what they will.|But history takes no note of them.
s;Simon;Do you really believe that is true?|Boudica was a village warrior, but she fights with us now.
s;Mitzi;Boudica will not be even a footnote in the history of your journey.|Do not confuse us with her.|The people in the city below us mean nothing.
